version_description:
This release introduces a handful of improvements, including:
- Now you can watch an account's Vines in any order you want. From an account page, tap the icon next to Posts and select Newest, Oldest or Popular.
- With 3D Touch, you can make a Vine or open Explore right from your device's screen.

Get the update to try out these new features and more.

Now you can edit your Vine's caption for a brief period after you post.

This release introduces a handful of other improvements and bug fixes. Get the update to try them out.

Thanks for using Vine! To provide you with a great experience, we regularly update our app to introduce new features and performance improvements. Download the latest update to be sure you have the best version of Vine.

Thanks for using Vine! This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes.
We regularly update our app to provide you with an even better experience. Download our updates to be sure you're using the best version of Vine. 

You can also turn on automatic updates: tap Settings > iTunes & App Store > enable Updates.

This update brings you a whole new way to watch Vine.

Our new design introduces a "Watch" button that lets you kick back and view the entire story of any channel. While you're watching, you can tap and hold on a Vine to make it loop.

To see the date a Vine was created, tap the white space below the post! 

Other features include:
- Sort an account's likes as well as posts
- Speed and performance improvements and bug fixes

New! We're moving beyond the Vine. We're starting to experiment with longer video. Creators will be able to attach a video to their Vines, turning Vines into a trailer for a bigger story. 

- Tap "Watch More" to... well... watch more! Rotate your phone to view in widescreen.
- Double-tap the parts you like to see hearts fly. More taps = more hearts!
- For the first part of this experiment, long videos will come from a select group of creators. We plan to expand to more creators over time. Follow us on Twitter (we're @vine!) and check out our blog.vine.co for updates.

Now you can easily switch between your Vine accounts without logging out. Just tap your account name on the top of the profile tab.

This update also includes performance improvements and bug fixes.

Now you can easily add cool sounds to your Vines with our soundboard.

Just tap the soundwave icon at the bottom of the Details screen to add pre-recorded sounds or to record your own sounds.

Vine has become the Vine Camera! With this camera app you can still make six-second looping videos and post them to Twitter or save them to your phone. Happy Vining!
